message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations and productivity. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $12000 to you. Considering its high quality and unique features, I am offering this exceptional product to you at an exclusive price of $13500. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive the best value while also allowing us to maintain a fair profit margin. I look forward to your consideration and the opportunity to contribute to your business success.
